quoteText: We may terminate or restrict your use of our service if you violate these Terms of Use or are engaged in illegal or fraudulent use of the service.
title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

tosdr.case: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
tosdr.tldr: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict your use of our service, without notice, for any or no reason whatsoever.
